page.content: 1.Do you live in{Lyndurst} 22y 78n {"YES" GOTO Q? 2>>> "NO" GOTO Q? 11>>> 2.Did you {go }to {the school }10y 12n 3.Did your parents live here 8y 14n 4.Did they go to the school 2y 20n 5.Is a{by pass }needed 19y 3n 6.Do you{work}in Lyndhurst 12y 10n 7.Are you{happy}with the{shops}15y 7n 8.Are you{happy}with{tourists} 9y 13n 9.{Happy}with{community life} 18y 14n 10{Happy}with{public transport} 5y 17n 11{Live}in the{British Isles} 74y 4n 12{Staying}in Lyn.{overnight } 11y 67n 13{Camping or caravaning } 17y 61n 14{Been}to Lyndhurst {before } 58y 20n 15 Is a{by pass needed } 65y 13n 16{Happy}with the {shops} 69y 9n 17{Happy}with{public transport}30y 58n 18{Happy}with {local people } 78y 0n 19{Happy}with{public services }70y 8n 20 Do you {work}in Lyn. 8y 70n {We leave you to work out the details!
